All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Board interface for the pentago game.
    BoardMethod
    Board for the pentago game.
    BoardMethodTest
    The test class which contains the unit cases for the board method.
    Client
    The interface that represents a Client of the Pentago game!
    ClientCommands
    The class containing the client commands following the protocol specified to us in the project description!
    ClientHandler
    The client handler responsible for handling the messages sent by the client and sending messages to the client when not in a game of Pentago but connected to the Server.
    ClientHandlerMethod
    The client handler responsible for handling the messages sent by the client and sending messages to the client when not in a game of Pentago but connected to the Server.
    ClientMethod
    The class representing a client connected to a server hosting the Pentago game!
    ClientSideMethod
    The class containing the main method to run the client! Starts a thread of clientMethod!
    ComputerPlayer
    Class for maintaining a Computer player in Pentago.
    Game
    Interface for maintaining the Pentago game.
    GameHandler
    The game handler responsible for handling the messages sent by the client and sending messages to the client when in a game of Pentago.
    GameHandlerMethod
    The game handler responsible for handling the messages sent by the client and sending messages to the client when in a game of Pentago.
    GameLogicMain
    The main class where the game will be run.
    GameMethod
    Class for maintaining the Pentago game.
    GameMethodTest
    The test unit cases for the game method to see if the game and board classes works.
    HumanPlayer
    Class for maintaining a human player in Pentago.
    IncorrectFormatException  
    InMethod
    The class responsible for the messages the client receives from the server hosting the Pentago game and doing specific tasks depending on the message received from the server!
    InvalidInputException  
    InvalidMoveException  
    InvalidRotationException  
    Mark
    Represents a mark in the Pentago game.
    NaiveStrategy
    Class for maintaining the Naive strategy for the Computer player in Pentago.
    NetworkPlayer
    Class for maintaining a Network player in Pentago.
    OutMethod
    The class responsible for the messages the client has to send to the server hosting the Pentago game!
    Player
    Abstract class for keeping a player in the Pentago game.
    PlayerFactory
    The interface for the PlayerFactory! PlayerFactory will be used to create new types of players in the pentago game.
    PlayerFactoryMethod
    The class for the PlayerFactoryMethod! PlayerFactoryMethod will be used to create new types of players in the pentago game.
    Server  
    ServerCommands
    The class containing the Server commands following the protocol specified to us in the project description!
    ServerMethod
    The server class for the Pentago game! This class is responsible for the server that will be started to host other clients to play the pentago game!
    ServerSideMethod
    The class containing the main method to start the server!
    SmartStrategy
    Class for maintaining the smart strategy for the Computer player in Pentago.
    Strategy
    Interface for maintaining the various strategies of the computer player in Pentago game.
    StrategyFactory
    The strategy factory interface used to create a new type of strategy!
    StrategyFactoryMethod
    The strategy factory class used to create a new type of strategy! Implements the StrategyFactory interface!
